channel.title: Idris on The Weekly Challenge - Perl & Raku
channel.description: Recent content in Idris on The Weekly Challenge - Perl & Raku

item.title: The Weekly Challenge - Guest Contributions
item.description: As you know, “The Weekly Challenge”, primarily focus on Perl and Raku. During the Week #018, we received the solution to “The Weekly Challenge - 018” by Orestis Zekai in Python. It was a pleasant surprise to receive solution in something other than Perl and Raku. Ever since regular team members also started contributing in other languages like APL, Awk, Bash, C, C++, Clojure, Elm, Erlang, Go, Haskell, HTML, Idris, Java, Javascript, Lisp, Node, Postscript, Prolog, R, Ruby, Rust, Swift and Tcl.
